official_title: The Effects of Pre-Transplant Music Therapy for Patients Undergoing Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplant
inclusion_criteria:
* Patients undergoing inpatient allogeneic stem cell transplant
* Must be fluent in English
* Must be able to communicate verbally and have no significant hearing impairment
* Have capacity to provide consent
* All diagnosis, graft source, donor sources will be included.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Patients not meeting the above inclusion criteria
